General.Name: Wetzel S.A
General.Description: Wetzel S.A. engages in the manufacture and sale of electrical, lighting, and automotive components. It offers conduits and boxes, lighting products, cable glands, and aluminum accessories for electrical installation, and commercial and industrial lighting. The company also develops, produces, and sells aluminum and iron components and castings for the automotive segment. Wetzel S.A. was incorporated in 1932 and is based in Joinville, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Dona Francisca, 8300, Joinville, SC, Brazil, 89239-270
